name.label: Connector name
name.description: Assign a name to uniquely identify the data source connection

description.label: Connector Description
description.description: Write a description to indicate the purpose of the data source connection

frequency.description: Set how frequently the connectors will pull data from the data source

time.label: Time
time.description: Set the time to run connector to pull data from data source

help.label: Help
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

tio-access-key.label: Access Key
tio-access-key.description: Access Key of Tenable with access to its API

tio-secret-key.label: Secret Key
tio-secret-key.description: Secret Key of Tenable with access to its API
